name: Grappler (Uppitydonkey57)
description:
Grappler is an endless runner about running through a city, grappling onto lights and dodging danger. 

The game is only available on Android. (I might make a web port later)

I made this game in one month for a project where I am attempting to make a game every month for 6 months. This is the first game. You can check out my progress in a devlog I am making on TIGSource
